title: HELP CRASH
body: Hello. I have a issue where I select a champion and launch my game, but it doesn't launch it crashes. Everytime I try to play a game it just crashes after champion select and I have not found a solution. If anyone has help then it would be great.

replies.body: By crashing I assume you are referring to a bugsplat error, which can happen if something is failing to render the game.  Check out the steps in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to get your crashing fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
I have not been able to fix my game. I have tried everything on that list.

Hey, i know its random and you probably have better things to do but could you check this out and let me know if its a bug please? 
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/AEckxO6A-ivern-and-krugs

I appreciate your reaching out, but I'm not part of the bugs team so I don't have visibility on that.  I don't know.  :/  Posting in the bug boards was a solid plan!  The right team may be able to look into your report!
Thanks, I appreciate you checking it out anyway.
